body_html:
alright, I copied it into a directory as follows:

ubuntu@ip-172-31-44-171:~/cuda$ cp /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcud* .
ubuntu@ip-172-31-44-171:~/cuda$ export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:$(pwd)"
ubuntu@ip-172-31-44-171:~/cuda$ echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/home/ubuntu/cuda

and got the same Bus error issue.

body:
alright, I copied it into a directory as follows:
```
ubuntu@ip-172-31-44-171:~/cuda$ cp /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcud* .
ubuntu@ip-172-31-44-171:~/cuda$ export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:$(pwd)"
ubuntu@ip-172-31-44-171:~/cuda$ echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/home/ubuntu/cuda
```
and got the same Bus error issue.
